Joey Wong: a student at Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School, posted a video on Twitter showing the cover and page of the yearbook from the viral image. Wong confirmed that David Hogg's photo was present in the 2017 yearbook, indicating that he attended Stoneman Douglas High School.
Another student: Sarah Chadwick, also confirmed that the yearbook in question was from Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School, as she recognized multiple people in the picture and pointed out that someone in the photo was wearing a Douglas t-shirt.
